body_html: This fix is not right. The chief queue runner can only run by the chief. This seems to expose a bug somewhere but we have not figured it yet. We are in the middle of changing the sync_rep_optimizer so will come back to this after that change.

body: This fix is not right. The chief queue runner can only run by the chief. This seems to expose a bug somewhere but we have not figured it yet. We are in the middle of changing the sync_rep_optimizer so will come back to this after that change.
